item.title: 10 R tips from rstudio::conf(2020) - tidy evaluation, piping into later arguments, changing axis colors and more.
item.description: Tip 1: geom_col(): you’ll never have to specify “stat = identity” for your bar plots ever again! Tip 2: Pipe into later arguments of a function using . Tip 3: Make gifs using the gifski package Tip 4: Usethis and chatty functions Tip 5: Tidy evaluation: accessing variables inside functions using {{ }} and .data Tip 6: Adding NULL to a plot changes nothing Tip 7: Using italics, colour in axes text using the ggtext package Tip 9: Using show_col() for viewing colour palettes Tip 10: Using slider for taking rolling averages Rstudio::conf(2020) is my favourite conference.
